sys_name.message: Macify - macOS screensaver videos new tab

sys_description.message: Turn your Chrome's new tab page into macOS's gorgeous screensaver aerial videos.

error_video_source.message: No video element found to switch source.

message_video_1.message: It looks like you are using local video server but fetching videos failed. Please make sure you have set the correct URL. Follow the  instructions  here to make it work.

message_video_2.message: It looks like you are using Apple Server as video source, but havn't trust Apple's Root Certificate yet. Follow the  instructions  here to make it work.

message_video_3.message: It looks like you are our reverse proxy. The great way to use Macify is to set up local server or use Apple's Server without reverse proxy. Follow the  instructions  here to make it better.

set_options_note.message: Instructions | Changelogs | Rate Macify

set_note.message: If you choose to fetch videos from Apple Server, Chrome may not trust Apple's root certificate, so you can temporarily use my Cloudflare reverse proxy to fetch videos (check the checkbox below). However, I cannot guarantee the long-term availability of this service. Therefore, I strongly recommend that you follow the instructions to manual trust it.

set_video_note.message: The better way to use this extension is setting up a local HTTP service, following these instructions.

set_weather_note.message: Go to weatherapi.com to get your free API key.

set_clock_note.message: Only affected when clock is shown.

set_chatgpt_note.message: Currently ChatGPT Search only supports GPT-4o and GPT-4o-mini.

set_history_permission.message: History permission is required for this feature.

error_get_weather.message: Get weather failed. Please check the API key and city name then try again.

error_delay_time.message: Delay time must be an integer between 1 and 10000.

error_weather.message: Please input City Name and weatherapi.com API KEY

error_weather_api_key.message: The API Key must be at least 30 characters long and consist only of letters and numbers.

error_history_permission.message: History permission is required to enable this feature.

set_your_google_api_key.message: Enter Your Google Cloud Translation API Key

error_google_api_key.message: API Key length must be at least 39 characters.

set_google_api_note.message: If your browser's language is English, you don't need Cloud Translation API key.

error_gizmo_configuration.message: 's GPTs setting is incorrect. Please ensure both values are either filled or left blank.

set_gizmo_note.message: The GPTs ID is the part marked in green in the example URL below https://chat.openai.com/g/g-dqSxf0sSW-shan-shu-fan-yi-gong-si.

error_all_gizmos_empty.message: All GPTs are empty. Please fill in at least one.
